name: Zodiac Axis
description:
Zodiac Axis is a mystery visual novel (story-based game with choices) that blends suspense, romance, and Asian-inspired fantasy elements using charming characters and a lush worldlore.INTRIGUE, MAYBE
Play as Alison Hart, a fresh-out-of-college journalism graduate who is shortly employed at an infamous online tabloid. At first, you're not worried—even when you're assigned to investigate six people who are rumored to carry the Spirits of the Zodiacs. It's just a nonsensical tabloid job. Right?CHOICES, CHOICES
Make a myriad of entertaining choices and experience 50+ hours of game content. Shape Alison's skillset and determine your fate—or just have some good fun.DEEPER SECRETSUncover what's behind the veil with the occasional logic segment.A LUSH WORLDDiscover a captivating city with history and flavor, rendered with beautiful hand-painted backgrounds, and enhanced with lush, organic music. Hear the characters come to life with partial phrases of English voice acting.FALL IN... LIKE?Romance five guys. Not simultaneously.
